step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your hands clasped comfortably in your lap.
Try to keep your elbows closer together as you raise your hands towards your forehead.
You're doing well spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Remember to keep your head upright.
Excellent hold! Maintaining an upright head and avoiding pulling forward are key.
Nicely done reversing the motion. Return smoothly to your starting position.
Second rep starting well. Hands clasped in your lap.
Focus on keeping those elbows in as you bring your hands up.
Good job widening your elbows behind your head. Keep that head steady.
Great hold! You're maintaining good form by keeping your head upright.
Excellent return to the start. You completed the exercise well.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your elbows close when raising your hands and spread them wide behind your head. Maintaining an upright posture throughout is important for shoulder and chest flexibility.
